home.title: Glitch Generator
home.description: Glitch editor based on the text-shadow CSS properties.

why.title: Why?
why.description: Because it's fun! I wanted to have a user friendly tool to generate glitch effects, which can be hard to configure manually.
why.also: Type whatever you want and see the magic happen!
